thread.title: Ray, Bearcats Wrap Up Share Of Title
thread.title_full: Ray, Bearcats Wrap Up Share Of Title

author: hdmoadmin
title: Ray, Bearcats Wrap Up Share Of Title
text:
12:55 am - October 23, 2015 Ray, Bearcats Wrap Up Share Of Title 
Follow us and be famous . Jeremy Elliott follows the blocking of Arron Frost (50) and Mark Phonlasouk on this play thurdsay night against Mansfield 
By Glenn M. Parrish 
Democrat Editor 
The Booneville Junior High Bearcats clinched no worse than a share of the Conference 3A-4 title Thursday with a convincing 35-6 win over Mansfield. 
The Bearcats (8-0, 6-0) got three touchdowns from Carson Ray in pounding the Tigers. 
Ray scored on a 42-yard run two plays into the game, returned an interception 52 yards on Mansfieldâ€™s second offensive play to make it 21-0 and ran 3 yards for a touchdown to make it 28-0 with 5:39 left in the first half. 
Brandon Ulmer and Michael Hesson added touchdown runs for the Bearcats and it was 35-0 at the intermission. 
Seventh Grade Bearcats 20 Mansfield 8 
The Bearcats (6-2, 4-2) scored 20 unanswered points after falling behind early. 
Colton Ritchie ran for 119 yards and two touchdowns and Ethan Wooldridge added 76 yards and a score. Both scored second half touchdowns to erase an 8-6 Tiger lead at the intermission.
